e="preserve">Christian Dayton Clemenson (born March 17, 1958) is an American actor. He is well known for his role of Jerry "Hands" Espenson in the television series "Boston Legal".
His movie roles include "Hannah and Her Sisters", "Broadcast News", "Apollo 13" and "The Big Lebowski", and played Tom Burnett in Paul Greengrass' "United 93". He starred in ' as prosecutor William Hodgman. He was born in Humboldt, Iowa.
